text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Credit health insurance" means insurance on a debtor that provides indemnity for payments that are due on a specific loan or other credit transaction while the debtor is disabled as defined by the policy.

"Credit involuntary unemployment benefit insurance" means insurance on a debtor that provides indemnity for payments that are due on a specific loan or other credit transaction while the debtor is involuntarily unemployed as defined by the policy.
"Credit life insurance" means insurance on the life of a debtor in connection with a specific loan or other credit transaction.

section.section: "Debtor" means a borrower of money or purchaser or lessee of goods, services, or property rights or privileges for which payment is arranged through a credit transaction.
"Debtor" includes the husband or wife or both, as specified in the certificate of insurance, if the husband and wife are jointly liable under a contract of indebtedness.

text.section: "Indebtedness" means the total amount payable by a debtor to a creditor in connection with a loan or other credit transaction.
